verses.roman:
grāmera īśvara tomāra--govardhana-dhārī
kuñje āche, cala, tāṅre bāhira ye kari

synonyms: grāmera-of the village; īśvara-the proprietor; tomāra-your; govardhana-dhārī-the lifter of Govardhana Hill; kuñje āche-in the bushes in the jungle; cala-let us go; tāṅre-Him; bāhira ye kari-take out.
translation: "The proprietor of this village, Govardhana-dhārī, is lying in the bushes. Let us go there and rescue Him from that place.
